properties.name: Cincinnati, OH, Radisson Hotel
properties.description: Posted by Timhuey Phone: 859-491-1200 Fax: 859-491-8698 Hotel is across river from downtown and about 12 miles/15 minutes from Airport, all highway driving. Transportation provided by hotel van. After 2330 Crews take taxi to hotel. Amenities --------------- Free Trolley stops at hotel and travels through downtown. Free Wireless Internet. Sleep Number Beds. Fast food restaurants across the street. Bars and restaurants within walking distance south of hotel in the "German Village". Gym with some free-weights located in Basement. Pool and Jacuzzi Indoors on Lobby level. Free computer for use off lobby. Some rooms have Refrigerator. Negatives ------------------- Highway noise if room faces interstate. Sleep Number Beds. Walking across Bridge at night to downtown is dicey.
